Introduction¶

Why this project ?¶

We are three master students at INSA Lyon (France) in bio-informatics and modeling :

  • Armande Cirot
  • Claire Lemonnier
  • Anissa El marrahi

We created this package with one module : bstools for our software deployement project . The aim of this project was to make us discover all the steps from the development to release of a software. The step of deployment is very important, because we have to bring a consistent documentation for the user and bring all the tools that allow a good use of the package.

bstools is for Basic String tools because these are tools in order to manipulate strings in Python in a simple way. It is also a private joke about our department at school that is called Biosciences (BS)….It’s ok if you didn’t understand the joke =)
